statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE region = 'West'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, region FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers WHERE region = 'North America'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, region FROM customers WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 AND region IN ('Asia', 'Africa')
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers_table;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers_table WHERE region='USA';
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers_table ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers_table WHERE region='Europe' OR region='Asia';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, region FROM customers_table JOIN regions_table ON customers_table.region = regions_table.region_name;
SELECT * FROM customers_table WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers_table WHERE region='North';
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions_table WHERE region_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM customers_table WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT customer_name, region, country FROM customers_table c JOIN regions_table r ON c.region = r.region_name;
SELECT customer_name, region FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE '%East%'
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE region='East'
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500)
SELECT customer_name, region_name FROM customers INNER JOIN regions ON customers.region = regions.region_name
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, order_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, region_id FROM customers ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, region_name FROM customers JOIN regions ON customers.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(order_details.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_details.quantity FROM orders JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC, order_details.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_region FROM customers WHERE customer_region='North';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'Sou%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_region = 'North';
SELECT customer_name, customer_region FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_region FROM customers JOIN regions ON customers.customer_region = regions.region_name;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.order_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
